com.qtplaf.library.trading.server

Interface ConnectionManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DkConnectionManager

    public interface ConnectionManager
    Interface responsible to manage connections.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addListener(ConnectionListener listener)
      Add a connection listener to receive connection events.
      void connect(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, AccountType connectionType)
      Connect to the server, using the given string and password, for the given connection type.
      void disconnect()
      Disconnect from the server.
      AccountType getConnectionType()
      Returns the connection type of the connection or null if not connected.
      boolean isConnected()
      Returns a boolean indicating if the client is correctly connected to the server.
      void reconnect()
      Tries to reconnect to the server using the current client information.

    • Method Detail

      • addListener

        void addListener(ConnectionListener listener)
        Add a connection listener to receive connection events.
        Parameters:
        listener - The connection listener.

      • connect

        void connect(java.lang.String username,
             java.lang.String password,
             AccountType connectionType)
      throws ServerException
        Connect to the server, using the given string and password, for the given connection type.

        It is the resposibility of the server implementation to ask for any additional information to connect, like for instance a PIN code.

        Parameters:
        username - The user name.
        password - The password.
        connectionType - The type of connection.
        Throws:
        ServerException - If a server error occurs.

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()
         throws ServerException
        Disconnect from the server.
        Throws:
        ServerException - If a server error occurs.

      • getConnectionType

        AccountType getConnectionType()
        Returns the connection type of the connection or null if not connected.
        Returns:
        The connection type.

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Returns a boolean indicating if the client is correctly connected to the server.
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating if the client is correctly connected to the server.

      • reconnect

        void reconnect()
        throws ServerException
        Tries to reconnect to the server using the current client information.
        Throws:
        ServerException - If a server error occurs.
